rule.condition: not (same(operational.device in $L.file, true)) and not (same(logical.name in $L.file, NULL)) and same(downtime.start in $L.file, NULL)
rule.conditionDesc: ( operational.device in CurrentRecord != true AND logical.name in CurrentRecord != NULL AND downtime.start in CurrentRecord = 'NULL')
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="CI is operational">operational.device</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Affected CI">logical.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Outage Start">downtime.start</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="datetime">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Outage Start via JavaScript (when ( operational.device in CurrentRecord != true AND logical.name in CurrentRecord != NULL AND downtime.start in CurrentRecord = 'NULL'))
